home_section_3_description: The problem is... no one tells you the simplest way to get started.
home_section_3_slide_1: Do you believe that financial freedom is no longer a distant dream – but something you can reach with just one decision?

home_section_4_description: Wealth Farming is not just a smart financial ecosystem – it is a personalized strategic platform that optimizes cash flow, multiplies assets, and flexibly adapts to all economic cycles, creating a competitive advantage for investors in both the short and long term.
home_section_5_description: "Review Indexes are no longer a secret on Wall Street. The NFT BEQ Indexes are changing the game!" – John Doe, NYSE expert
home_section_5_tab_label_1: Legal financial NFTs, transparent cash flow
home_section_5_tab_content_1: NEC and Review Index are transparent investment NFTs, with no fixed interest commitments, no dividend distributions – complying with standards that do not classify them as securities, easily auditable and publicly disclosed.
home_section_5_tab_label_2: Dual legal framework - aiming for a global IPO
home_section_5_tab_content_2: Operated by two independent legal entities in the US and the UK, the BeQ ecosystem is ready for IPO through SPAC - paving the way for global institutional investors.
home_section_5_tab_label_3: Integrating RWA - real assets enter DeFi
home_section_5_tab_content_3: Wealth Farming expands into real estate, physical assets, and commodities through the NFTization model – helping real cash flow safely and transparently access DeFi.
home_section_5_tab_label_4: The performance of Index Review has grown remarkably.
home_section_5_tab_content_4: BeQ's strategic indicators have increased by over 300% in 27 months, fully backtested and publicly available on the system – no emotional promotion, only based on actual results.
home_section_5_tab_content_5: The BeQ ecosystem is a comprehensive decentralized financial infrastructure – combining transparent smart contracts, AI asset evaluation, genuine backed stablecoins, and cash-flow NFTs – operating like a digital bank but without intermediaries.
home_section_5b_title: And give the best things to the investors
home_section_5b_description: By joining the Wealth Farming ecosystem, investors can enjoy extraordinary profits and flexible liquidity 24/7 with the Zero Limit policy – freely trading NFT certificates, borrowing with DeFi, and managing digital assets without any restrictions.
home_section_6b_description: Wealth Farming is the world's leading decentralized investment and asset management platform, utilizing Fintech, AI & Blockchain, helping investors generate stable cash flow, achieve sustainable asset growth, and attain true financial freedom.

home_section_6_tab_label_1: Absolute transparency thanks to Blockchain technology

nec_section_1_button_title: Do you want to work forever to pay the bills, or would you prefer a source of income that automatically covers the bills?
nec_section_8_title_1: You spend money, others get rich. With NFT NEC – you spend money and... become rich with them.
nec_section_6_title_1: Act now - Don't let time take away your opportunities.
nec_section_6_description_1: Will you continue to spend 1,000 USD per month and vanish, or let it earn interest and return that cash flow to you every month?
nec_section_6_description_2: You can continue working your whole life to pay the bills... or invest once so that the bills are paid automatically forever?
nec_section_6_description_3: The NFT NEC certificate is not an extravagant investment; it is a MUST-HAVE investment if you want financial freedom!
nec_section_7_title_1: The NEC NFT ownership process takes only - 3 minutes
nec_section_7_description_1: Download the MetaMask wallet app, create and verify your account.
nec_section_7_description_2: Deposit BNB into your MetaMask wallet via Remitano, Binance, or deposit directly in MetaMask using a bank/international card. Then exchange BNB for USDC.
nec_section_7_description_3: Click on the NFT NEC website link, connect your MetaMask wallet.
nec_section_7_description_4: Select Fund > Buy NFT NEC > Investment Amount (the number of NFTs you want to own), click "Buy NFT" and confirm the transaction.
nec_section_7_description_5: Congratulations! You have officially created a stable, safe, and sustainable source of income.
nec_section_4_slide_1_content_1: "As one of the first people to participate in Wealth Farming, I only hoped for some additional monthly passive income. But what I received was so much more than that."
nec_section_4_slide_1_content_2: Thanks to the stable income from BeQ Holdings' Wealth Farming Fund, my family has been able to purchase our dream home and comfortably pay the bank interest each month without stress, and we even have some financial surplus from the passive income generated by the Wealth Farming Fund.
nec_section_4_slide_1_content_3: I am grateful to the CEO and the BeQ team for creating a credible and sustainable financial solution. If you are looking for a reliable source of passive income, this is a worthwhile option to start with.
nec_section_4_slide_2_content_1: "Before investing in WF, my biggest concern was whether the capital would be preserved. But after more than a year of being involved, I am completely at ease – because the cash flow is still coming in steadily every month."
nec_section_4_slide_2_content_2: I always believe in the captain - someone who is compassionate, visionary, and responsible for the investors. WF not only provides me with a stable source of passive income, but also helps me feel more secure and proactive in life.
nec_section_4_slide_2_content_3: Compared to previous investments, the profits from WF are outstandingly superior. I am grateful to the team who has worked hard to create such a sustainable and humane model.
nec_section_4_slide_3_content_1: "If I had known 10 months earlier, perhaps today my assets would have increased significantly... But I do not regret the past – because I was able to seize the opportunity as soon as I learned about the NFT NEC."
nec_section_4_slide_3_content_2: After investing and realizing the true potential, I decided to use my surplus to choose a 1-year investment package instead of withdrawing interest each month – because I want to increase my assets by 2.4 times in a systematic and sustainable manner.
nec_section_4_slide_3_content_3: I believe in the BeQ team. And I believe that if you are truly serious about your financial future, just in 3 years – you will have the freedom that previously seemed like it would take a lifetime to achieve.
nec_section_5_content_1: You need 1,000 USD / month for living expenses.
nec_section_5_content_3_3: in 2 years to not have to worry about finances for the rest of your life.
